articles.title: Best food events around Boston and New England for fall 2025
articles.description:
Fall isn't just the season for leaf peeping in New England. From Vermont to the Cape, there are multiple foodie events to eat pumpkin, apples, and more.

The post Best food events around Boston and New England for fall 2025 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Explore local fall food events across Boston and New England starting September 2025.
Enjoy seasonal flavors like pumpkin and apples at various regional festivals.
Support local businesses and farmers by attending these community-focused culinary events.

articles.title: Emmy nominee Jeff Hiller joins the latest episode of the Love Letters podcast
articles.description:
The “Somebody Somewhere” star tells Meredith Goldstein a story about a breakup.

The post Emmy nominee Jeff Hiller joins the latest episode of the Love Letters podcast appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Emmy nominee Jeff Hiller shares a personal breakup story on Love Letters podcast.
Hiller stars in HBO's 'Somebody Somewhere', enhancing Boston's cultural scene.
Podcast episode offers local listeners relatable insights into relationships and personal growth.
